topics.body:
Woohoo

Same-sex marriage may be legalized in all of the usa in 2016.  The reason being is that quite a number of states currently have appeals in place and have frozen same-sex marriages until it goes to a appeals court, but the other thing is that some of those cases are going to circuit courts which are for judicial circuits as well and aren't just for one state.  What that means is there probably will be ten or so states to repeal their bans by the end of the year and there's going to be a bukakke of courts striking down the laws going into 2015 and by the end of the year it's just going to be the deep south and a couple other states desperately clinging on.

End of 2014:  "Gay marriage now legal in just over half of the country"
Early 2015: "Gay marriage now legal in the vast majority of the country"
End of 2015:  Deep south, "*IT'S NOT OVER YET!*"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

Chances are by the end of the year gay marriage is going to be legal in texas.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532e6ced6368722036520000#post_532e6ced6368722036520000
The deep south yes; texas probably not.

Texas is not even close to as conservative as people like to claim.  It's a southern state for sure, but it's nowhere near as like say mississippi or such.

Let me put it this way, republicans are quaking in their boots that they may lose texas in due to wendy davis having a real actual shot at flip turning the state's political leaning upside down coupled with the high hispanic population and that the younger generations are now leaning left.

Abott has a 50% chance, wendy davis has a 40% chance.  If wendy doesn't win in 2014 then they have really grim news in 2016 if clinton runs.  If clinton runs she'll take texas no questions asked.

I currently live in louisiana and let me put it this way; I always thought how people describe the state as racist and homophobic were exaggerations and no they're not; sundown towns and purely white schools.  Putting texas in the same boat as louisiana you'd have to be crazy.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"Yes it's me!  I'm here to get yukari!"
"Now you are going to leave"
Marisa, "Hey what did you do to my friend?"

"No"
